course.title: Neurophysiology of Central Circuits
course.faculty_text: Rachel I. Wilson (Medical School), John A. Assad (Medical School), Richard T. Born (Medical School), Michael Tri Hoang Do (Medical School), Christopher D. Harvey (Medical School), Gabriel Kreiman (Medical School), and Margaret S. Livingstone (Medical School)
course.description: This course introduces major themes and fundamental concepts underlying current research in systems neuroscience. Each week covers a different theme, and draws on research from different sensorimotor modalities and model organisms.
course.prerequisites: Neurobiology 200 or with permission of instructor.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Medical School as NB 721.0.
